projects.name: Safe Place
projects.shortDescription: Full-Stack website to tackle the problem of domestic violence against women. From kick off to testing I Worked on it with a team of three. We used React, SCSS, HTML and bootstrap. We added google maps and Wordpress API. And, used Figma and Illustrator for the design and illustrations.

projects.name: Travel Board
projects.shortDescription: A web-based Kanban-style for travel list-making. We utilized firebase for sorting database. React, React router, bootstrap and Ant design were used.

projects.name: NEAR in Minutes
projects.shortDescription: NEAR in Minutes makes it as easily as possible to learn about NEAR by binge-watching videos in your favorite language.

projects.name: Quaking Aspen
projects.shortDescription: Quaking aspen is a UK based client which I worked with a team of designers and programmers to deliver brand-identity and UI/UX of the project.

projects.name: Guest Book
projects.shortDescription: Sign in with NEAR and add a message to the guest book! A starter app built with an AssemblyScript backend and a Vue frontend. This Frontend is created for learning purposes.

projects.name: Meme Museum
projects.shortDescription: Sign in with NEAR and Share your favorite MEME. Comment, vote, and engage with all the cool memes! A starter app built with an AssemblyScript backend and a Vue frontend. This Frontend is created for learning purposes.

projects.name: Movies Hub
projects.shortDescription: Online searchable source for movies information including ratings, cast and others. Used MovieDB API for fetching data and applied object-oriented programming with vanilla JS

projects.name: MaDreamLibs
projects.shortDescription: MaDreamLibs for Kids is a phrasal template word game that consists of one player prompting others for a list of words to substitute for blanks in a story before reading. The concept is to help the dreams of kids come true :D

projects.name: Change Makers
projects.shortDescription: This design was created for change makers platform.
